top_comments_top.body:
The Abbey Road medley

Tool intermission and Jimmy also Parabol and Parabola

Led Zeppelin - Heartbreaker / Living Loving Maid

Queen - We Will Rock You / We Are The Champions

Led Zeppelin II - Heartbreaker/Living Loving Maid

Pink Floyd - Dark Side of the Moon - Brain Damage/Eclipse
Everything on The Streets - A Grand Don’t Come For Free. The full album is a story

Gorillaz - Intro/Last Living Souls, Don't Get Lost in Heaven/Demon Days

King Crimson - 21st Century Schizoid Man/I Talk to the Wind

A Tribe Called Quest - What?/Scenario

RJD2 - The Horror/Smoke and Mirrors

I could go absolutely all day with this question. This is probably the biggest loss of people's disinterest with whole albums, the sequencing of album tracks is what makes these things classics.
